com.ualberta.cs.alfred

Class LocalDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ualberta.cs.alfred.LocalDataManager

  • public class LocalDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Avery on 11/25/2016. class that stores and manages 'offline' data that will be dealt with once connectivity is restored
